mapper.select:
select t.id , t.area_code areaCode, t.area_name areaName, t.area_level areaLevel, t.parent_area_code parentAreaCode, t.parent_area_name parentAreaName, t.lon, t.lat, t.create_time createTime from city_area t where 1=1 and t.status_cd = '0'
and t.area_code like concat(#{areaCode},'%')
and t.area_name like concat('%',#{areaName},'%')
and t.area_level = #{areaLevel}
and t.parent_area_code = #{parentAreaCode}
and t.parent_area_name like concat('%',#{parentAreaName},'%')
ORDER BY t.area_code asc
